markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Badger](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=126)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 32 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The burrowing badger is plentiful in most temperate forests. All badgers are naturally fierce and tenacious, and their squat stature belies their strength and speed.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Badger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=561) (Creature 0), [Giant Badger](/Monsters.aspx?ID=562) (Creature 2)
name: Badger
